meanings.definition: To take part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: I will partake in the game with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She loves to partake in community events.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to partake in the bird's singing competition.
meanings.sent4: Let's all partake in the dance of life together.
meanings.sent5: Partaking in the treasure hunt made the day unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To have a share or portion of something.
meanings.sent1: I will partake in the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: Each person can partake in the profits of the business.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to partake in the dog's bone collection.
meanings.sent4: She was happy to partake in the joy of her friend's success.
meanings.sent5: Partaking in the beautiful sunset filled her heart with peace.

meanings.sent1: Let's all partake in the tasty meal together.
meanings.sent2: He likes to partake in a cup of tea in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous rabbit decided to partake in the mysterious potion.
meanings.sent4: She would often partake in the sweet nectar of the flowers.
meanings.sent5: Partaking in the warm soup on a cold day was comforting.
